backend/main.mo: Defines chat backend actor with user accounts, messages, media, emojis, and authorization/storage mixins, including user join logic and profile updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report referencing index.html update to change the document title to 'Dini GC'.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes with color tokens and global CSS resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the document title to 'Dini GC' and loading the root script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing user session persistence and routing between JoinScreen and ChatScreen.
frontend/src/components/ChatScreen.tsx: Chat UI handling messages, media uploads, emoji/GIF pickers, profile editing, and backend interactions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiPicker.tsx: Component for browsing, selecting, and uploading custom emojis with validation and preview.
frontend/src/components/GifPicker.tsx: GIF search/trending loader using GIPHY API with error handling and selection support.
frontend/src/components/JoinScreen.tsx: UI for joining the chat, handling username entry, optional image upload, and user creation via backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/MessageItem.tsx: Renders an individual chat message with avatar, timestamp formatting, content, emojis, and media handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and exposing login and logout functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for messages, counts, media uploads, sending messages, default pictures, and related backend calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a white and #cde5aa color theme and global font settings.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Configuration for Giphy API access, including API key, endpoints, and default query parameters.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, react-query, Internet Identity provider, and global CSS.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params from search or hash, storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from session or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining themes, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, features, and pending requests for the Dini GC application.
